title: New Rune Page bundle
body:
I literally just bought the 7 Rune page bundle on May 20th. And today i checked that the 7 rune page bundle is taken out, which before was 7 pages for 2600 RP , which was is about 371 RP per 1 page.

Now theres this new Add 2 Rune pages for 590 RP that is 295 RP per 1 page... That essentially means i lost about 525RP. And so i thought ok. Ill just use a refund token so i can save that extra 500 RP but i can't even refund rune pages???

Did RIOT notify or post anywhere that they planned to make this huge rune page change because I am a little butthurt that i lost that extra RP that i could have easily saved by waiting 3 days...

replies.body: Totally understand how you feel on this one.  Go ahead and [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do about the RP difference.

"Hello Summoner,

Thanks for writing. Sadly, you purchased a 7 Rune Page Bundle. Our sale is for 2 for 1 rune page which means if you purchase 1 rune page then you will get another rune page for the same price. A 7 Rune Page Bundle doesn't count for this sale.

I'm sorry if my response was a bummer :( but if there is anything else I can assist you with, let me know!

Thanatosâœª
Riot Player Support Specialist"

This was the reply i got... Unfortunate :( . Is there anything that can be done? I've seen several posts asking about this situation, how people lost RP and IP for purchasing rune pages without knowing the upcoming sale.

Thanks for trying to help.
That shouldn't be the case. Can you give me your ticket number? I'll follow up on this.

Thanks so much. I dont know if it was you or maybe they just re-considered my ticket, but i got the 500RP back. And i know that's just like $5 but its really nice to see that Riot has good customer support. Thanks a lot for the exception!
Can't take credit for this one! Looks like someone else saw my response and forwarded it onwards during the night so that you'd get a faster response.  Glad to see it all worked out though :)
See this is why I like rito, (Balance team is a different story atm).  Overall Rito works with the LoL community and can achieve amazing things which is why LoL grew to where it is
